title: Deep Learning Tutorial | What Is Deep Learning And Neural Networks | Deep Learning | Simplilearn
excerpt: Deep Learning is one of the core components of Artificial Intelligence. This video on Deep Learning Tutorial will help you understand Deep Learning basics and look into what a neural network is. You will learn the concept of a perceptron and how neural networks work.
